DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1 Safety Study LY2127399 Combination With Bortezomib
DOC.detailed_description: This study drug know LY2127399 , give common treatment multiple myeloma call bortezomib ( Velcade ) . The primary purpose study ( 1 ) Determine safety LY2127399 combination bortezomib side effect might associate ; ( 2 ) Assess whether LY2127399 combination bortezomib may help patient relapsed refractory multiple myeloma ; ( 3 ) How much LY2127399 give patient along bortezomib .
